description: Returns a list of Batch jobs that require a specific consumable resource.

parameters.name: consumableResource
parameters.description: The name or ARN of the consumable resource.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: The filters to apply to the job list query. If used, only those jobs requiring the specified consumable resource ( consumableResource) and that match the value of the filters are listed. The filter names and values can be: name: JOB_STATUS values: SUBMITTED | PENDING | RUNNABLE | STARTING | RUNNING | SUCCEEDED | FAILED name: JOB_NAME The values are case-insensitive matches for the job name. If a filter value ends with an asterisk (*), it matches any job name that begins with the string before the --*'. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that's used to return a more specific list of results from a ListJobs or ListJobsByConsumableResource API operation. name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case sensitive. values (list) --- The filter values. (string) ---

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: The nextToken value returned from a previous paginated ListJobsByConsumableResource request where maxResults was used and the results exceeded the value of that parameter. Pagination continues from the end of the previous results that returned the nextToken value. This value is null when there are no more results to return.

nested_items.name: jobs
nested_items.description: The list of jobs that require the specified consumable resources.

nested_items.name: jobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the job.

nested_items.name: jobQueueArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the job queue.

nested_items.name: jobName
nested_items.description: The name of the job.

nested_items.name: jobDefinitionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the job definition.

nested_items.name: shareIdentifier
nested_items.description: The fair-share scheduling policy identifier for the job.

nested_items.name: jobStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the job. Can be one of:
SUBMITTED.
PENDING.
RUNNABLE.
STARTING.
RUNNING.
SUCCEEDED.
FAILED.

nested_items.name: quantity
nested_items.description: The total amount of the consumable resource that is available.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: A short, human-readable string to provide more details for the current status of the job.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp for when the job was started. More specifically, it's when the job transitioned from the STARTING state to the RUNNING state.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) for when the consumable resource was created.

nested_items.name: consumableResourceProperties
nested_items.description: Contains a list of consumable resources required by the job.

nested_items.name: consumableResourceList
nested_items.description: The list of consumable resources required by a job.

nested_items.name: consumableResource
nested_items.description: The name or ARN of the consumable resource.

nested_items.name: quantity
nested_items.description: The quantity of the consumable resource that is needed.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken value to include in a future ListJobsByConsumableResource request. When the results of a ListJobsByConsumableResource request exceed maxResults, this value can be used to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
